title: Explainable AI for computational pathology identifies model limitations and tissue biomarkers
details: JR Kaczmarzyk, JH Saltz, PK Koo - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.03080, 2024
abstract: Deep learning models have shown promise in histopathology image analysis, but their opaque decision-making process poses challenges in high-risk medical scenarios. Here we introduce HIPPO, an explainable AI method that interrogates …

title: CanvOI, an Oncology Intelligence Foundation Model: Scaling FLOPS Differently
details: J Zalach, I Gazy, A Avinoam, R Sinai, E Shmuel… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: The rapidly evolving field of digital oncopathology faces significant challenges, including the need to address diverse and complex clinical questions, often involving rare conditions, with limited availability of labeled data. These limitations hinder the …
